column8:
flightNumber: Required, 4-10 characters, uppercase alphanumeric only (e.g., AI123, 6E2001)
 airlineCode: Required, must exist in the system
 fromLocation: Required, 3-100 characters
 toLocation: Required, 3-100 characters
departureTime: Required, must be in the future
 arrivalTime: Required, must be after departure time
 totalSeats: Required, 1-500 seats
 basePrice: Required, greater than 0, max 1,000,000
 Flight number must be unique

column8:
Validations Applied

 fromLocation: Required, cannot be blank
 toLocation: Required, cannot be blank
 travelDate: Required, cannot be in the past (present or future only)
 numberOfPassengers: Required, 1-9 passengers allowed
 isRoundTrip: Optional, defaults to false
 returnDate: Optional, for future round-trip support
 Only shows flights with available seats >= number of passengers
 Only shows active and scheduled flights
